Reviews.Title: “Good Location--Good Service”
Reviews.Author: cdepks
Reviews.Content: This hotel is in a good spot in Istandul. It is close enough to Taxim Square and the nightlife, yet not in a noisy neighborhood. Service was fine (not overboard, not lacking). Elevators (like many in Turkey) are VERY small. Nice lobby area with free internet and a small bar section, pricy. The area has several small stores and restaurants, easy to pick up snacks, beer, soda, etc. Many street walkers approached me and asked the typical "you want Turkish women?", just kept walking. I didn't eat at the hotel restaurant. I am returning soon and may stay again or possibly try something new just for a change. rates are reasonable as well.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel,staff,location”
Reviews.Author: c k
Reviews.Content: No words to describe.Fantastic hotel and location.Rooms designed modern, staff professional and helpful.they gave us all information we needed.They directed us for a city tours.it was a excellent experience.Special thanks for all.

Reviews.Title: “Good location!”
Reviews.Author: Ivan D
Reviews.Content: My wife and I loved Istambul and this is the best location to stay there, near from main street and easy to conect everything !

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay!”
Reviews.Author: Kristina H
Reviews.Content: We were three girls sharing a lovely spacious triple room. The staff was very helpful and service minded and helped us to reserve tables and nightclubs. The breakfast was also nice. Perfect!

Reviews.Title: “Like :) I'll come back”
Reviews.Author: salma_411
Reviews.Content: I've spent in Eresin hotel 5 days of my honey moon ...and really it was very good despite the relatively small bathroom and there was no storage place but it works.. we had the room 911 it was a corner room,quiet room where u can sleep good, but next time i may try another room as it has no view just the front hotel only!! the light wasn't strong inside the room which was romantic for us we didn't need the AC,but I think it wasn't working breakfast was good i like the pastry .. when we were leaving to the airport we asked from were we can get a taxi but the ''concierge'' was very polite he called for us a taxi in 10 seconds

Reviews.Title: “Nice decent sized room with NO STORAGE SPACE!!!”
Reviews.Author: Aaron S
Reviews.Content: Nice hotel in a convenient location to Taksim square, and for the price a pretty good find - Beautiful view having breakfast every morning on the top floor. Front desk quite helpful in arranging a bus, and giving us a general idea navigating through the city. Rooms are very Modern and smart, although a few complaints: Beds: Not comfortable at all (we had 2 twin beds)...small hard and flimsy mattress. Only a bottom sheet and a comforter (no middle sheet) TV: Not easy to operate (maybe we had a bad one)...we're pretty tech savvy & this one was impossible some nights just to turn on. Noise: Windows didn't block out much of the noise..even though it is off on somewhat of a side street, we could still here the ongoings outside - they didn't have a fan to loan us to block out some of the white noise either. Bathtub: Faulty design meant we had a big puddle on the floor after every shower needing lots of extra towels. Closets/Storage: We could hang 4 items each & No other storage space for clothes...Very inconvenient. Overall if the above doesnt bother you...not a bad place to spend some time. Service is very attentive and the property is very well-maintained. Free wifi in the lobby if you have a laptop too & lots of comfortable places to sit. Staff spoke English pretty well, so that was nice too.

Reviews.Title: “Cosy common room”
Reviews.Author: mathildexl
Reviews.Content: We got an early check-in for room #512, which was nice.. The room was ok, if only some of the modernist design items would not lack practicability .For example: the safe was right on the floor, to open we had to crouch to the floor. No wardrobe only a small rack with 4 (four) coathanger. The washing-bowl looks very elegant but difficult to use without wetting the bathroom. Breakfast on the top floor is good if you stick to the turkish dishes and it would have been very good if the tea and coffee would not be served in a container. The best part are the cosy common rooms, lobby and bar on ground floor. We would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, nice Staff”
Reviews.Author: EmadGharaibeh
Reviews.Content: I've stayed in Best Western Eresin Taxim for 4 nights in October; this hotel shares the same building, reception, and lobby for another hotel, which is Eresin Premiere. the rooms were fine, but a little bit small, and the most annoying thing was the closet... there was a tiny space and they call it a closet, it was literally a 30 CM deep, with a meter wide.. and that's it! we had to leave our clothes in the bags for the entire period of our stay. other than that, for the breakfast, it has good varieties, the service is excellent with good staff who speaks English (this is rare in Istanbul). i recommend staying in this hotel for people visiting Istanbul for few days, and i give it a good value for its location.

Reviews.Title: “good hotel & very nice location”
Reviews.Author: srassas
Reviews.Content: The best thing in this hotel is its very practical location. Rooms are nice and clean although a bit small. Staff was friendly and helpful. Breakfast was acceptable and probably need to be more diversified. Overall, nice hotel and good value of money.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: amp-qld
Reviews.Content: We stayed for one night at a rate of 127Euro. We could have stayed in Sultanahmet for much less but wanted to be near Taksim for our last night in Istanbul. Given that, the Eresin Taxim met all our needs well. Breakfast in the top floor restaurant was very good with a wide selection of dishes and a great view. The staff were helpful, such as printing our boarding passes. The room was large, quiet and well furnished with comfortable beds. I consider wi-fi in the lobby to be an adequate service and it was plenty quick enough. There are lots of very pleasant cafes and restaurants nearby.

Reviews.Title: “Not recommended”
Reviews.Author: Manoliani
Reviews.Content: Although the hotel is placed in good location near Taxim square, the rest impression was justâ€¦terrible!!! In a few words: the toilet was DIRTY, hairy places from previous client, powdered equipment (face mirror, drier, kettle). But the worst of all was that, after my complains in the reception desk, no one came to clean, at least the toilet. I have traveled a lot abroad for business, in high class hotels, but I can honestly say that I never met such a situation. It is my first time after 20 years in hotels that I forced by staffs behavior to write a bad review.

Reviews.Title: “Fare cost, excellent service, well located”
Reviews.Author: hoberlander
Reviews.Content: Well located a lot of restaurants, safe area, close from Taksin area, Hotel facilities fare comparing with price, but outstanding personnel service.

Reviews.Title: “Eresin Taksim is the best!!!”
Reviews.Author: Marcello47770
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for the best , Eresin Taksim is the one! I've stayed Eresin Taksim Hotel between 1st - 3rd of May and it was lovely. Excellent staff, charming and quiet rooms they have.

Reviews.Title: “The best in Taksim”
Reviews.Author: RoozbeH
Reviews.Content: I booked through hotels.com and checked-in happenned smoothly ,It's a best western hotel so you expect good quality,room was great and spacious with modern decoration, plenty of closet space,location is really great , an area that are mostly hotels and everything is around you from istiklal street to all cafes and restaurents.the only problems that i had were the room service which i had to call couple of times before having a bucket of ice delivered to my door and the other one was the problem with the bathtub which after takeing a relaxing bath I faced with a small pound in the bath and the hallway ( a leakage in the tub probably) , breakfast is served and the highest floor so ot gives you a pleasent view of istanbul while sipping coffee ! Overall it was great and would definitly go again,but book waiy in advance because it gets fully booked easily (I had to stay in another hotel in May because Eresin was full).

Reviews.Title: “piece of art”
Reviews.Author: Emad_Elsherif
Reviews.Content: I spent my honey moon in Istanbul and stayed for one week in Eresin Hotel, i have to say that i found it much better than I've expected .. my first impression was: it's a piece of art ! the rooms are wonderful , the beds and furniture are artistically designed in a simple and modern style using excellent materials , even the walls are covered with wallpaper , the bathrom is very neet and clean , i fell in love with the room ! every tiny space is well used and taken care of . the hotel is very clean and the service is great , the location is excellent , only steps away from Taxim square where you can reach all means of transportation. i would really recommend this hotel for everyone, one final thing i have to say : some times you can hear people in the rooms beside you if the are moving alot or getting in and out ! thats it .. i will upload the photos of the hotel now .. enjoy :)

Reviews.Title: “Superb value for the money”
Reviews.Author: a_egger
Reviews.Content: Located in Taxim the hotel is located in a very calm area due to pedestrian zone around. The hotel staff is very courteous and helps with every concern, e.g. printing the boarding pass for the flight back. The breakfast area is located on the roof of the building which gives a stunning view over Istanbul with a view to the Hagia Sophia. My room had a very interesting window from the room to the bathroom (the blind can be activated). A taxi stand is just round the corner, but staff will order one and the taxi is there within 1 minute. Local markets with everyday items are numerous, so provisioning yourself is of no problem. Typcial restaurants are in the surrounding streets. Within a 4min walk the Grand Hyatt can be reached, if you want to dine upper class. The night life offers s.th. for everyone, it seems that this district never sleeps. All in all I can recommend the hotel!

Reviews.Title: “A nice hotel with a good location & service”
Reviews.Author: SirpaS
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 4 nights in this hotel and the hotel was much better than I expected to be: it was modern, well cleaned and the service was really good. The breakfast was also really tasty and large. And the location is great - just two blocks away from the Taxim metro station (good connections) but really quiet and pleasant because it is on a pedestrian street. Would definetely choose this hotel again!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect”
Reviews.Author: beirutmansar
Reviews.Content: All services are excellent, nothing missing. Excellent location, easy to locate. Easy to go to far places and come back. Managers have super relation ship

Reviews.Title: “At the end of the day; you become who you serve"”
Reviews.Author: GGUU71
Reviews.Content: Fantastic!! Have some good fun , along with my work. Perfect optimisation for the ratio and quality with a highly motivated and friendly staff. I look forward to meet you again very soon.

Reviews.Title: “it's fantastic place”
Reviews.Author: AmebaCharlie
Reviews.Content: Best Weatern Eresin Hotel it's a fantastic place to spend your time in Istambul. have fantastic location, excellent service. the staff it's very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “AMAZING HOSPITALITY”
Reviews.Author: tgoranitou
Reviews.Content: I want to thank you about the amazing hospitality and kindness of hotel's staff. Especially, the helpfulness of the reception was incredible, as far as I didn't have any idea of the city of Istanbul. We were so satisfied from all your services!! Thank you for everything! We will visit you again, for sure!!!

Reviews.Title: “This was an Excellent Hotel with great Staff”
Reviews.Author: dottore95
Reviews.Content: The rooms were very nicely decorated, very modern and clean. The staff, especially at the reception desk, were very helpful, respectful, considerate, and friendly. The hotel feels very warm and safe; The breakfast buffet was fantastic with panaromic views of Istanbul. The location was great as well, close to Esteglal Ave. at which resturaunts and shops stay open untill 12:00 am. Would definately return to this hotel, and believe me I'm not a relative of the owner or anything like that.....! I just had a good experience there.

Reviews.Title: “Charming hotel”
Reviews.Author: Gabriela82
Reviews.Content: This hotel got extraordinary stuff. Also location of the hotel is the center of Istanbul. You should try it.

Reviews.Title: “What a great hotel! Impeccable service and perfect location.”
Reviews.Author: mnkmnk
Reviews.Content: We definitely recommend this hotel if you want your trip to Istanbul to be an unforgettable one. Staff is professional, prompt and present at all times. The management ensures all of your requests are met. There is a personalized service from the moment you walk in at the front desk to housekeeping and food and beverage outlets.

Reviews.Title: “wonderful excellent fantastic”
Reviews.Author: ThessalonikiEva
Reviews.Content: it was a very good experience.The service of the hotel was very good .thre room was very beautiful ant the staff very gentle.the hotel is very near to taxim square and very close to the monuments of Istanbul.also the airport is only 20 klm.it was a very pleasent stay and everybody must visit Istanbul and eresin hotel.

Reviews.Title: “best of the best”
Reviews.Author: ustunol
Reviews.Content: we stayed for a week and we reall enjoyed it. great hotel, good service, very clean, friendly staff, convinient location, great atmosphere. we would recommend this hotel, would definately consider the same hotel for my next trip. thankyou to the managers and all staff.

Reviews.Title: “Really good hotel in the middle of Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: cebeci_11
Reviews.Content: Rooms are very elegant and comfortable . Breakfast , room service and restaurant are delicious . Hotel staffs are helpful and friendly . We had really fun in the hotel .

Reviews.Title: “loved the hotel”
Reviews.Author: almehairi
Reviews.Content: I loved the hotel a lot .. it was excellent ! the staff were so friendly ... the food was great , i liked the brackfast buffet !

Reviews.Title: “a very comfortable stay and great position”
Reviews.Author: martita_red
Reviews.Content: It was a holiday with my boyfriend... and it's been magic!!! The location is great, in the most active nightlife area of Istanbul, and anyway very well connected by public transports and taxi with Sultanahmet and any other parts of the city... The staff was very kind and efficient, the room was really nice and the food of their restaurant delicious...The breakfast was on the top floor with a nice view of the city, and one time we had a problem with our flight and the receptionist did all he could to help us! We really appreciated. So, I strongly recommend this place, if I'll come back to Istanbul I definitively go back there.

Reviews.Title: “If only they had an iron...”
Reviews.Author: easytofindinaclub
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in this hotel twice now. First the good, this is a good value hotel, in a great location. Breakfast is decent with a wide variety of foods, and whilst on this visit my room was a little small on previous visits I have had better sized rooms. Now onto the bad, I had a business meeting at which I needed to make a good impression, having a creased shirt would not have been great. Unfortunately when I asked if I could borrow an iron I was told that 'there are no irons, this is a hotel', obviously something could have been lost in translation, but I was very specific and asked three times. I was then told that I could use the trouser press in my room, which might have been a reasonable alternative, except there was no trouser press in my room. This was met with a shrug of the shoulders, by reception. In the end I user the hotels laundry service which I was assured would have my two shirts available by 9.30am the next morning, with a doubt in my mind I found a shirt shop and bought a new shirt which the shop ironed for me. This was lucky as my shirts were eventually ready for me at 11am, the reception told me that there was a translation problem, relating to the times, this may well be the case, but it does not deflect from the point that it seems impossible to get a shirt ironed quickly. I have stayed all over the world in hotels and consider having an iron available to be a minimum pre-requisite of a 3 star hotel. In summary if you're on business or likely to need a shirt ironed during your stay then I cannot recommend a stay here, if you are going to Istanbul for fun and want a decent hotel in a great location, then this is a good choice.

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel for a corporate business traveller”
Reviews.Author: Perepel
Reviews.Content: Decent hotel for a business traveller. 3 minutes walk from the Taksim square with its metro station, bus stops etc. Quiet neighborhood (all hotels around). Friendly personnel. Generally rooms are very clean, but the design is quite standard and "soulless". The walls are thin - sometimes you can hear occupants from nearby rooms. The breakfast is very simple - but there is no sense to pay extra monies in other hotels just for the better breakfast, since on Taksim there are dozens of cheap fastfoods. Quite recommended for corporate business traveller which prefer to save some monies not sacrificing the comfort

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location, Unfriendly Staff, one bag got opened while we were out!”
Reviews.Author: Azhar_Irfan
Reviews.Content: Location: Excellent Location, hardly 3-4 minutes walk to Taksim Square and istaqlal Street. Hotel is located in a vicinity that is guarded by police 24/7. Many small grocery shops around the hotel and also many rent-a-car services are nearby (like Budget, Avis, Hertz etc). Service: Very very very poor!!! Hotel staff is very rude at times. On our second day, one of my luggage bags got opened and the lock was stolen from the room. Fortunately, we had not kept any valuables in the bag and hence nothing was stolen. When i complained to the manager, he simply did not agree that anything like this can happen. I had to tell him to make sure it doesnt happen again or i will go to the police. Hotel: The hotel is nicely built, with nice room sizes and clean washrooms. Nearby Attractions: The location is ideal. it is very near Taksim Square and Istaqlal Street. Rent-a-car companies are all around the place. We got a car from Budget which was 4-5 mins walk from the hotel and their service was outstanding. Breakfast: The menu is limited, with repition everyday. Hardly had any changes to the menu in the 6 days we spent in the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: 293999Mary
Reviews.Content: Mrs.Mehrangiz.Azemzadeh from Iran Nov.4th-Nov9th 2010 Our stay in Istanbul was great due to the comfortble provided bye Best Western Eresin Taxim hotel .which is located in the heart of istanbul's Taxim square shopping and business area.It has the best traditional Turkish hospitality,wonderfull personals very kind &polite manager and the receptions staffs. Rooms very clean with access to the internet in rooms.direct dial telephone,satellite tv. tea/ coffee available in rooms(free of charge).Complimentary full breakfast.and all the other amenities. I recommend this hotel to everybody wishes to have great time in Istanbul .And I,ll always come to this wonderfull hotel when I get chance to visit beautifull Istanbul in future.

Reviews.Title: “It had everything we needed but still was not the most comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Mary-EllenCallahan
Reviews.Content: Eresin Taxim is in a nice location near to Taxim Square and Istiklal Caddessi. And the restaurant had very good food and wine. But for some reason, our stay was less comfortable than some other spots in Istanbul. Not everyone spoke English well enough and the minibar was not refreshed daily. We had to make several complaints while there to get the minibar restocked and that took 2 days. It can be romantic or good for business travel, but watch out on your credit card statement. We were charged twice. Maybe it was accidental, but it's all I have to go off of.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location, clean and functional with no frills”
Reviews.Author: Miz1962
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for 3 days at the end of July 2010. It really is very well located with restaurants and shops right outside and Taxim Square a couple of minutes away. The Metro stop is at Taxim Square and we found the public transport in Istanbul amazingly easy to use. The hotel is what the Best Western's are known for: fairly basic but efficient I would say though that it is misleading to say that it has a pool. It's basically a very small plunge pool which we did not use. My kids gave me a lot of grief for not being able to swim! However, the hotel is a great staging post for seeing the best of Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Excellant”
Reviews.Author: MariaMughal
Reviews.Content: Our stay in Istanbul was great due to the comfort provided by Eresin Taxim Hotel. All the employees were helpful and freindly. We had a great time and we recommend to everyone that they should choose Best Western Eresin Taxim Hotel when they come to Istanbul. Its in the heart of the city, the rooms are very comfortable, and the food is great. And most importantly the hotel staff is so good. Keep up the high standards!

Reviews.Title: “very nice, and we had a great stay at your hotell, exellent !!”
Reviews.Author: KENstjordal
Reviews.Content: Short way to one of the greatest shopping streets in Turkey !!

Reviews.Title: “Poor poor poor”
Reviews.Author: HOKOGA
Reviews.Content: This hotel was not clean, had terrible breakfast and indifferent staff. In contrast to another BW hotel I staid at last year, this was a huge dissappointment.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, but some problems...”
Reviews.Author: Aimilios
Reviews.Content: Excellent location. Room was spacious. Water hot but pressure low. Hotel was clean. Sound proofing from road noise fine. Wireless internet charged and only available in lobby. Breakfast far from what you would expect from a 4+ star hotel due to bad service (very slow on refreshing tables) and variety of food offered. At least it was offered at the terrace with a great view. Elevators tottally unacceptable, as they were too small (four persons can fit in with great difficulty). During our stay one out of two elevators was out for almost a full day. Even with both elevators working, it could take you 10 to 15 whole minutes of waiting for a space in the elevators on a busy day (i.e. groups arriving or leaving).

Reviews.Title: “Cozy, quaint and welcoming......all of the comforts of home.”
Reviews.Author: soulreavergirl
Reviews.Content: My husband and I truly enjoyed our stay at the Best Western in Istanbul. Beautiful lobby, friendly warm staff. The manager made sure that we were very comfortable. The room was very inviting.clean and well maintained. Cozy dining areas with amazing traditional and modern cuisine. The gym was fabulous and convenient and spa took away all of our stress. The hotel is just minutes from shops, restaurants and night life. We were never bored. So much enjoyment!!! We cannot wait to visit again.

Reviews.Title: “simple, comfortable, and welcoming”
Reviews.Author: abq90
Reviews.Content: it is a clean hotel simple furnished but nice. the breakfast is very good especially with the prefect view that you see from their resturant on the roof of the hotel. it has a perfect location which is 10 minutes away from the bus station and the underground metro, and that makes transportation even better. It is at the heart of istanbul where all the famous shops and resturants are located.

Reviews.Title: “Beware of traps!”
Reviews.Author: 01SKP
Reviews.Content: Great location and cozy rooms, combined with friendly staff and great food can't overshadow my bitter experience, due to the unfair treatment. We got placed in the top floor, very next to the air-conditioner system of another hotel, so noisy that sleeping was wishful thinking. If sleeping is the purpose of booking, beware of traps!

Reviews.Title: “average stay”
Reviews.Author: octaveind
Reviews.Content: stayed at this property from 1st april to 4th april 2009. An average hotel. wd rate it less than 3 stars but exorbitant prices. a bit of an european hangover! Location ideal if u are interested in shopping, food & music as all the bars a in close proximity to the hotel. pleasant staff & decent service.

Reviews.Title: “Central location, good service!”
Reviews.Author: IoanaMihaela
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel 30 apr - 03 may 2009.The hotel is still updating rooms. We received a triple room on the 6th floor, very spacious, 3 separate beds, medium size bathroom, flat screen TV, coffee/tea facilities. Breakfast had a medium variety but everything fresh and tasty, and was nicely served in the breakfast room on the terrace on the top floor with very nice views of the city. The hotel is centrally located, cca 200 m away from the Taxim Square having every way of transportation (tram, bus, metro) nearby. Staff very friendly and helpful, wanting to meet your needs and trying to make a very comfortable stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Central Location”
Reviews.Author: CelloDublin_Ireland
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the Best Western Eresin Taxim hotel for 3 nights in November 2008 and found it to be a great hotel. It was in a brilliant location literally a 3 minute walk to Taksim Square and Istiklal Street (for shopping and nightlife!) The staff were very friendly and the hotel reception area, bar etc were lovely. We stayed in a standard bedroom which was very nicely decorated and spotlessly clean. Our only negative was that the bathroom (although also spotlessly clean!) needed to be upgraded a little. The roof-top breakfast room gave a lovely view of Istanbul and the buffet food was of a very good quality and lots of it ! We didn't get a chance to eat in the hotel restaurants but the menu's looked very nice (great selection) and the restaurants were always busy. I would definately recommend this hotel for a stay in Istanbul. Great location, great people. Celine - Dublin, Ireland.

Reviews.Title: “very pleasant hotel staff”
Reviews.Author: marianknits
Reviews.Content: This hotel is located on a quiet street with similar hotels all about the same in rating. I was at a conference so met travelers staying at some of the other hotels and I think mine was probably better at least in the breakfast I got. My first room was a smoking room so I refused and then was given a tiny room in the back facing some air conditioning units. The big lamp was missing a lightbulb but an electrician promptly arrived and fixed that and also gave me an electric thing for one of my own appliances. But while I didn't want to use the heat, it was very hot anyway. AFter two nights I had 3 plumbing problems and the management immediately moved me to a much larger nicer room across the hall facing front. The beds were firm and I slept well all 4 nights. There are apparently more modern rooms in this hotel but at a higher price which I wasn't prepared to do. Also, you need to be firm and ask for a no-smoking room. The breakfast was quite extensive and very good except for the breads which seemed quite hard. In addition to the great yogurt and honey and jams, there was also always eggs, sausage and other cold cuts, cheeses, cereals and halvah and apple cake. The hotel staff without exception were really pleasant and very helpful. Location for this hotel is in Taxim which is safe. Lots of restaurants especially along the tram walkway. Best one was a workers' cafeteria. I was concerned about being an older woman traveler on my own but had absolutely no problems. At this time of year there are few tourists so everyone spoke to me in Turkish which I didn't know even one word. Weather was great too.
